Travel directors Spain and Portugal, September 15th to October 6th 2019

DaybyDay

Day 1- Sunday, September 15th



start finish location description notes owner
12.15h 14.15h Lisbon Airport Meet & Greet by Norberto Delgado Flight EK 191 1 bus for passangers + 1 bus for luggage CEE
14.15h Hotel Altis Avenida Check in The hotel has not front parking. Bus will drop 30 metres away past hotel. Norberto will call hotel before so that bell boys will meet and pick up luggage. HT
18.00h 20.30h Cozinha Da Estacion Dinner RECOMMENDED MENU: Starter: Vegetable soup Main dish: Grilled fish platter Dessert: Lime Pie Drinks; House wine, beer, soft drinks,water and coffee CEE

Day 2- Monday, September 16th



start finish location description notes owner
08.30h 14.15h Altis Hotel Depart for Belem Tower by Tuk Tuk Tuk tuk will be waiting for the group outside the hotel Norberto will go with the group CEE
09.00h Belem Tower Photo Stop CEE
09.30h Belem tower Depart for Jeronimos Monastery CEE
09.45h Jeronimos Monastery Visit outside CEE
10.05h Jeronimos Monastery Depart for Rossio CEE
10.30h Rossio Arrive Rossio and begin walking tour including Alfama Full walking tour End of Tuk Tuk Tour This is a full walking tour that will be both up hill by road and downhill by stairs. Good walking shoes needed CEE
12.30h Irish Pub Light lunch

1 bifana per person requested to the Irish Pub paid by CEE

Drinks paid directly by Travel director TOUR LEADER 		CEE/TL
13.30h 14.15h Tram 12 Board Tram 12 and tour 5 minutes walk from Rossio Square Using tram 12 because it is a circular tram and crosses most of the same sights as tram 28 but without all of the tourists. Tram tickets have to be paid directly to the driver. Tickets will be paid by TD tour leader or each guests directly TL//HT
14.15h Altis Avenida Hotel End of the tour Free time until dinner HT
19.30h Altis Avenida Hotel Depart by walking (15m) to Clube de Fado CEE
20.00h Clube de Fado Dinner Menu Couvert: Bread, butter and olives Soup: Green Cabbage Soup Main dish (please select the choice in advance): Cod fish with rice bean or hake fillets with broth
or Cod fish with dream sauce or Chicken stewed with port wine or Fried pork portuguese style or small stakes of Peru with cream Dessert: Fruit salad Drinks; “Clube de fado” wine, Mineral water or beer Digestive: coffee, Brandy or Porto **Norberto will manage a good table for the group 		CEE
21-21.15h Clube de Fado Fado Show CEE

Day 3- Tuesday, September 17th



start finish location description notes owner
08.00h 17.00h Altis Hotel Depart for Obidos by bus Norberto will be the group guide Walking shoes again needed CEE
09.15h Obidos Arrive Obidos Walking tour around Obidos CEE
10.30h Obidos Depart for Barcallha Buddha Park CEE
11.00h Barcallha Buddha Park Visit by train around 20 minutes, stops 3 times. Every time it stops you can leave the train, visit your surroundings and when the train returns enter and continue the trip CEE
12.15h Barcallha Buddha Park Depart for Sintra CEE
13.30h Arrive Quinta de Pisao Location for picnic lunch Assorted picnic including: Kitchen with Mustard and honey sauce Tuna with Mayonnaise and yogurt sauce Salmon wrap with cheese and espinach 1 drink, chips and fresh fruit CEE
14.30h Quinta de Pisao Depart by bus for Sintra CEE
14.40h Sintra Begin tour Sintra including Pena Train tour Pena train: Roundtrip ticket for 50 minutes and some free time after the visit CEE
16.15h Sintra Depart for Altis Avenida Hotel CEE
17.00h Altis Avenida Hotel Arrival hotel CEE
18.30h Altis Avenida Hotel Dinner at the hotel at hotel on 7th floor at Gastro bar (Menu: Cozido a Portuguese (strew) HT

Day 4- Monday, September 18th



start finish location description notes owner
07.30h Altis Hotel Depart by bus for PorTO CEE
11.00h Porto Arrive to Lello Bookshop Costa coffee toilets next door to bookshop can be used. Bus will drop pax at Lello bookstore and then drive 5 minutes to Alfandega bus stop and driver/tour leader to arrange luggage transfer. The distance bus to hotel by car is 300 metres. Many streets for Porto are closed to big buses which complicates luggage transfer. CEE
11.45h Sao Bento Station Starting walking tour Guide name am:to be confirmed Walk is all down hill and easy. Continue directly to Flower street 54 Continue walk down flower street (this is a pedestrian street with many souvenir shops) and arrive into Ribeiro and Restaurant Fish Fix CEE
12.45h Restaurant Fish Fix Lunch Menu - To be confirmed Pending of confirmation CEE
14.00h Hotel Pestana Vintage Check in HT
16.00h Hotel Pestana Vintage Depart by walking to Funicular dos Guindais Guide: Daniel Funicular paid in cash by Daniel - tickets cannot be pre-booked CEE
16.10h Funicular dos Guindais Trip duration 10 minutes and walk across bridge directiio to cable car station CEE
16.45h Teleferico de Gaia Arrival and trip Daniel will pay in cash the pre-booked tickets CEE
17.00h Ferreira Port Factory Arrival and Port tasting Pending of confirmation We suggest to do the porto tasting shorter and go directly Palacio de la Bolsa to be on time CEE
18.00h Taxi Ferri Cross the river by Taxi Ferry Daniel will pay the tickets - Pending from guide company CEE
